edu.colorado.cs.ngn.lime.migration

Class LimeHost

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.colorado.cs.ngn.lime.migration.LimeHost

  • public final class LimeHost
extends java.lang.Object
    Container class to hold information about hosts when they need to be migrated. Will be populated by the api when a host migration needs to occur Hopefully is immutable
    Author:
    Michael Coughlin
